languages.text: "Леди Кассия, вернитесь в настоящее. Не пристало юной деве ломать свою голову столь мрачными размышлениями, когда их причина уже осталась в прошлом".
"Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."
languages.original_text: "Леди Кассия, вернитесь в настоящее. Не пристало юной деве ломать свою голову столь мрачными размышлениями, когда их причина уже осталась в прошлом".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “卡西娅女士，请把目光放在当下吧。年轻的女士不该沉浸在这种黑暗的沉思中，因为它们的起因都是过去的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅女士，请把目光放在当下吧。年轻的女士不该沉浸在这种黑暗的沉思中，因为它们的起因都是过去的事情了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Concentrez-vous sur le présent, dame Cassia. Une jeune femme comme vous ne devrait pas ruminer le passé ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: « Concentrez-vous sur le présent, dame Cassia. Une jeune femme comme vous ne devrait pas ruminer le passé ainsi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lady Cassia, céntrese en el presente. No está bien que una joven dama se torture con meditaciones tan sombrías cuando la causa de las mismas queda en el pasado».
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Cassia, céntrese en el presente. No está bien que una joven dama se torture con meditaciones tan sombrías cuando la causa de las mismas queda en el pasado».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「カシア様、どうか現在にお戻りください。原因がすでに過去にあるのに、若い女性がそのような暗い思索にふけるのはいいことではありません」
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア様、どうか現在にお戻りください。原因がすでに過去にあるのに、若い女性がそのような暗い思索にふけるのはいいことではありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Cassia, bitte kehrt in die Gegenwart zurück. Es ist nicht recht, dass eine junge Lady sich den Kopf mit solch dunklen Überlegungen zerbrechen muss, deren Ursache längst in der Vergangenheit liegt."
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Cassia, bitte kehrt in die Gegenwart zurück. Es ist nicht recht, dass eine junge Lady sich den Kopf mit solch dunklen Überlegungen zerbrechen muss, deren Ursache längst in der Vergangenheit liegt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

languages.text: "Leydi Cassia, lütfen günümüze dön. Genç bir hanımefendinin geçmiş meseleler yüzünden böyle karanlık düşüncelerle kendine acı çektirmesi çok yanlış."
languages.original_text: "Lady Cassia, please return to the present. It is not right that a young lady should agonise over such dark ruminations when their cause is already in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Cassia, lütfen günümüze dön. Genç bir hanımefendinin geçmiş meseleler için böyle karanlık düşüncelerle kendine acı çektirmesi doğru değil."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
